summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of $500,000 of a loan of $1,080,000 voted at the general election held in the City of Seattle on the 8th day of March, 1910, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 23220 of the City of Seattle, approved February 1, 1910, providing for the issuance and delivery of said bonds, providing for the form of said bonds and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof, and declaring an emergency.
